citation: Proclamation under the National Trust Act 2006 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the National Trust Act 2006

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the National Trust Act 2006 fix 22 December 2006 as the day on which that Act commences.

20 December 2006

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

Paula Wriedt

Minister for Tourism, Arts and the Environment

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 21 December 2006

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Tourism, Arts and the Environment.
